backend/main.mo: Defines core Gita data types, mood comparison logic, and functions generating chapter lists and supporting chatbot and verse retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking UI changes to affected frontend files and associated components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries of key frontend files for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/docs/APP_STRUCTURE_AND_FLOWS.md: Documentation outlining app architecture, navigation flows, backend API surface, and major component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables for light/dark themes, and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application shell handling tab navigation, scroll resets, theme and session providers, and fixed bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Chat composer with text and voice input, rotating placeholders, Enter-to-send logic, and speech-to-text integration.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatSafetyM: Modal warning users that the chat offers reflection, not therapy, with disclaimers and guidance.
Renders chat messages with support for verses, follow-up questions, and user/assistant styling.
frontend/src/components/chat/FollowUpQue: Displays suggested follow‑up question buttons that trigger a callback when clicked.
frontend/src/components/chat/MiniAskKris: Small input widget allowing users to submit short questions via textarea and send button.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Flow: Empty placeholder component for decorative overlay.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Kris: Fixed background layering multiple Krishna‑themed images with a readability gradient.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopMenuBa: Top navigation bar with tabs for main sections and a theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/settings/ThemeTo: Button that switches between light and dark themes using useTheme.
frontend/src/components/today/TodaysWisd: Displays today’s verse with loading skeleton and a back button.
Card showing verse details, translations, interpretation, Sanskrit toggle, and action step.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching chapters, verses, curated content, and chatbot responses via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Provides a hook that manages browser speech recognition, tracking listening state and transcripts.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom CSS variables, themes, and utility animations for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/DiscoverPage: Displays a grid of moods and shows detailed mood content, enabling navigation to chat.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/MoodDetailVi: Shows curated verses for a selected mood with loading states and a chat CTA.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen with hero content, mini chat widget, Krishna portrait, and navigation CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterDetai: Renders chapter details and a scrollable verse table with selectable verses.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterListV: Lists all chapters with search filtering and a CTA for today's wisdom.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ReadGitaPage: Controls navigation between chapter list, today's wisdom, chapter details, and verse details using state and callbacks.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/VerseDetailV: Fetches and displays a single verse with loading and error states, including a back button.
frontend/src/pages/TalkToKrishna/TalkToK: Implements chat UI for interacting with Krishna, sending messages, receiving bot responses, and managing mood and session history.
frontend/src/state/sessionContext.tsx: Provides context for mood, chat history, and pending messages with helpers to update and reset session state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata and feature requests focused on removing Hindi translation while keeping Gen Z interpretations in the UI.
